EmailTemplate.name: BIG-7910 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
******************************************************************* Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}
Hello,
Your patience has been truly appreciated. Recently, you were affected by an issue regarding disputed PayPal charges. A disputed charge resulted in a customer's order status changing to "Refunded". Consequently, an email would be sent to your customer stating the order had been refunded. A fix has been released.
Going forward, when a PayPal charge is disputed, it will now trigger a new label named "Disputed". This will not send an email to your customer. You will then have the ability to handle the situation as you see fit.
Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have further questions. Technical support is available 24/7:
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com
You can reply to this email or to view your case's status you can go here.
Please do not remove: {!Case.E2CP__Case_Thread_Id__c}
